name: lipsync
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:
installs lipsync, a lightweight service that provides automated file synchronization between multiple hosts: http://github.com/philcryer/lipsync

= REQUIREMENTS:

openssh, rsync, lsyncd

= ATTRIBUTES:

= USAGE:
